gobblin.writer

Interface DataWriter<D>

  • Type Parameters:
    D - data record type
    All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable

    public interface DataWriter<D>
extends Closeable
    An interface for data writers.

    • Method Summary

      Get the number of bytes written.
      void cleanup()
      Cleanup context/resources.

      Commit the data written.
      long recordsWritten()
      Get the number of records written.
